artist: Engraver: Gabrielle Perelle; Printer: Jean Mariette
description: a.) circular composition with a woven frame; building at right along river; man beneath a tree; 2 figures along right river bank; arched bridge in distance with building at left beyond bridge b.) seascape; storm(?) at sea with violent waves; fleet of sinking ships; cliff at left with buildings at top connected by a bridge; figure on bridge; tow images on a single mount
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

a.) in plate in black: Perelle invent. et fecit  2 Avec privil d R.  Mariette excut

b) in plate in black: Invente et gravé par Perelle  70  | on sheet in pencil 2-184
title: Print
